item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Search - Filter, sort, pagination, Bulk actions
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Search - Filter, sort, pagination, Bulk actions Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1123 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Bo > Shop parameters > Search Title page contains ‘Search’ Click to “Add new alias” Title page contains ‘Add new’ Create 39 new alias “Successful creation” notification
